article.title: Status and history for mai
article.para: No known problems at this time.

history.history-entry: Converted entities to plain Unicode. Thanks to Adam Twardoch.
Removed an extra space in article 26. Thanks to Eric Muller.
Replacement of U+0027 ' APOSTROPHE by U+02BC ' MODIFIER LETTER APOSTROPHE. Thanks to lemzwerg, Doug Felt and Anshuman Pandey.
stage 4: translation from the English by Dr. Ramanand Jha 'Raman', checked by Pandit Govinda Jha and coordinated by Anshuman Pandey.
